heroTitle1: BW Digit – Smart Web, SEO and App Solutions for Your Business
heroSubtitle: As a digital agency, we combine design, technology and strategy, to help your business grow online.
heroImgAlt: digital agency offering web development, SEO services and app solutions for businesses
servicesTitle: One Agency. All Your Digital Needs
servicesSubtitle:
Many businesses waste time with websites that are slow, hard to use or don’t match their goals. BW Digit fixes that. We create websites, online stores, mobile apps and marketing tools that work better, so your business looks good, runs faster and reaches more people. 

 As a full digital agency, we handle everything from design and development to SEO and e-commerce with one goal: Helping you grow online.
webDesignFeature1: Custom development & modern technologies tailored just for you
webDesignFeature4: WordPress, Webflow & Laravel — solutions that inspire
webDesignFeature5: UI/UX design for an outstanding user experience
seoMarketingFeature1: Result-driven SEO to increase visibility and attract high-converting leads
seoMarketingFeature2: Strategic online marketing to engage your ideal customers
seoMarketingFeature4: More traffic, leads, and revenue for your business
aboutUsSubtitle1: BW Digit – Your Trusted Digital Agency for Web Design, SEO & Online Growth
aboutUsSubtitle2: Focused on What Matters: Growth, Visibility and Function.
aboutUsDescription:
We help small businesses, startups, creators and growing brands with their online needs. That could mean building a website, getting better results on Google or creating an online shop that brings in real sales. 

 At BW Digit we focus on what matters: clean design, smart coding, clear words and tools that help your business grow. No fancy talk, just real work that gets real results.
whyChooseUsDescription:
At BW Digit, we're more than just a digital agency, we're your partner in online growth.

 ● 100+ Projects Delivered: From local shops to growing startups, we've built websites, stores, and apps that actually work.

 ● Fast Load Times: Our sites load in under 3 seconds. That means better user experience and higher conversions. 

 ● Better Rankings: 8 out of 10 clients see improved Google rankings within 6 months of working with us. 

 ● Mobile-First Design: 70% of traffic now comes from phones. We make sure your site works perfectly on all devices. 

 ● Real Support: Talk to real people who understand your goals, no bots, no delays. 

 BW Digit doesn't sell fluff. We build smart, effective digital solutions that help your business grow with clear results, you can see.
whyChooseImgAlt: BW digit team planning website development strategy
competency1Point2: BW Digit as your trusted partner
competency2Point2: WordPress development with a personal touch
competency3Title: Design that meets the highest standards
howWeWorkSubtitle: Infographics Showing Analysis, Design and Optimization for Digital Solutions.
howWeWorkL1: Analyze & Strategize — Understand your goals, audience & vision
howWeWorkL3: Optimize & Grow — Continuous SEO & conversion improvements

step1.title: Analysis & Strategy
step1.description: We begin with a deep dive into your business goals, target audience, and market position to develop a tailored digital strategy.

step2.title: Design & UX
step2.description: Our design team creates stunning, user-centric interfaces that reflect your brand identity while ensuring optimal user experience.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: We build your solution using modern technologies like WordPress, Laravel, or custom solutions, ensuring performance and scalability.

step4.title: SEO Implementation
step4.description: We implement comprehensive SEO strategies to boost your visibility and attract qualified leads to your website.

step5.title: Launch & Testing
step5.description: Comprehensive testing and optimization ensure your website performs flawlessly across all devices before launch.

step6.title: Growth & Optimization
step6.description: Ongoing support, monitoring, and optimization to ensure continuous growth and improvement of your digital presence.

missionText: To help businesses of all sizes succeed online with simple, smart digital solutions. From website development and SEO to e-commerce and mobile apps, our goal is to build tools that bring real results, more visitors, more customers and steady growth.
missionImgAlt: mission-focused web, SEO, and app development planning
visionText: We build long-term success stories together with people who trust us. Clear ideas, a professional team, honest work and measurable impact - that's what we stand for.
testimonialsSubtitle: Our clients report over 50% more visibility & revenue!
testimonial1Text: BW-Digit transformed our online presence with a stunning new website. Their web design team is top-notch!
testimonial2Text: Our marketing efforts have seen a significant boost since partnering with BW-Digit. Highly recommend their marketing services.
testimonial3Text: Thanks to BW-Digit, our website now ranks higher in search results. Their SEO expertise is evident.
testimonial4Text: BW-Digit developed a custom solution that perfectly fits our unique business needs. Exceptional work!
testimonial5Text: The technical perfection of our new platform is impressive. BW-Digit delivered beyond our expectations.
testimonial6Text: Working with BW-Digit on our web design project was a breeze. They are creative and professional.
testimonial7Text: BW-Digit's marketing strategies have driven real results for our business. We couldn't be happier.
testimonial8Text: Our search engine visibility has improved dramatically since we started using BW-Digit's SEO services.
testimonial9Text: The custom software solution BW-Digit built for us has streamlined our operations significantly.
testimonial10Text: BW-Digit ensures that our website runs flawlessly. Their commitment to technical perfection is commendable.
testimonial11Text: The web design services provided by BW-Digit exceeded our expectations. Our new site is both beautiful and functional.
testimonial12Text: BW-Digit's marketing team is knowledgeable and effective. They've helped us reach a wider audience.
testimonial13Text: We are extremely satisfied with the SEO results achieved by BW-Digit. Our organic traffic has increased substantially.
faqSubtitle: Find more answers here - or contact us directly for further questions!
faqQ1: What does professional web design cost at BW Digit?
faqA1: Costs depend on the project scope. Contact us for a personalized quote!
faqQ2: How long does it take to create a new website?
faqA2: Typically, it takes 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity.
faqQ3: Does BW Digit offer SEO optimization?
faqA3: Yes, we provide comprehensive SEO services.
faqA4: Absolutely, we specialize in redesigning existing websites.
faqQ5: Does BW Digit support e-commerce projects?
faqA5: Yes, we have extensive experience with e-commerce solutions.

useOfData.title: Use of Data
useOfData.content:
Use of data:

We use Google Analytics to analyze the use of our website and improve our services.
For newsletters and email marketing, we use MailerLite.
Your personal data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent - unless required by law.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to information, correction or deletion of your data at any time. If you have any questions about data protection, please contact us.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say About Our Marketing and SEO Work
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from businesses we've helped, improving their websites, apps and user journeys.

quotes.miras: BW Digit transformed our online presence. Their SEO strategies helped us reach our eco-conscious target audience effectively, resulting in a 200% increase in organic traffic.
quotes.thomasg: Their data-driven approach to marketing has been instrumental in our growth. The team's expertise in both SEO and digital marketing delivered measurable results within months.
quotes.jovanam: Working with BW Digit has been a game-changer. Their comprehensive marketing strategy helped us achieve top rankings for our key industry terms.
quotes.lauras: The ROI we've seen from BW Digit's SEO and content marketing efforts has exceeded our expectations. They truly understand the B2B landscape.
quotes.markush: Their technical SEO expertise and understanding of industrial markets helped us establish a strong digital presence in a competitive sector.
quotes.isabelk: Our conversion rate improved significantly after implementing their optimizations. The data-driven approach and user experience enhancements made a real difference to our bottom line.

cta.title: Ready to Grow with Smarter Marketing?

hero.title: Custom Web Development Built for Your Growth
hero.subtitle: Professional and Custom-Coded Business Website Design
hero.description: From fast-loading landing pages to full-scale web platforms, we build custom websites that are secure, scalable and made to fit your business goals.
hero.imageAlt: Professional and custom-coded business website design

services.title: Custom Websites Built to Match Your Business Needs
services.description: We don’t use templates or shortcuts. We build every website from the ground up: fast, SEO-ready and built to support your everyday work.
items: Mobile-First Design: Responsive layouts that work on every device
Custom Code: Clean, scalable and built for long-term growth
SEO-Ready Structure: Fast load times, clean code and smart structure for search engines
Third-Party Integration: Connect your site with CRMs, APIs, payment gateways and more
CMS Options: WordPress or other systems if you want full content control

technologies.title: Technologies We Use to Build Custom Websites
technologies.description: At BW Digit, we use reliable, modern technologies to create secure, scalable and high-performing web solutions built to last and easy to maintain.

frameworks.title: Frameworks & Languages
frameworks.description: We use proven frameworks and backend languages for fast and flexible development.

styling.title: Styling & UI Libraries
styling.description: For clean, responsive interfaces that look good on any device.

cms.title: CMS & Headless Platforms
cms.description: Manage content your way with flexible CMS and headless systems.

database.title: Databases & Backend Tools
database.description: Secure, scalable databases and backend support for all types of web applications.

devops.title: DevOps & Deployment
devops.description: We use trusted tools for deployment, performance and updates.

targetAudience.title: For whom we make customized websites
targetAudience.description: Our custom development services are built to support a wide range of businesses and teams at every stage.
items: Startups launching MVPs or building new web platforms
Small businesses looking to grow their online presence
Enterprises modernizing outdated systems and workflows
Creative professionals and personal brands needing a strong web presence
Agencies that need reliable frontend or backend development support
Internal teams building dashboards, portals or custom business tools
targetAudience.footer: Whether you're starting from scratch or rebuilding something that no longer works, we’ll help you get it right.
targetAudience.footerCta: Let’s build something powerful that helps your business grow online.

problems.title: We Solve Real Web Development Problems
problems.subtitle: If your current website is holding you back, we’re here to fix it with clean, fast and custom-built solutions that help your business stand out online.

items.problem: Generic Templates That Don’t Fit Your Brand
items.description: We build fully custom websites, no cookie-cutter themes.

items.problem: A Slow Website That Ranks Poorly
items.description: Our sites are fast, lightweight, and built with SEO best practices from day one.
We integrate your website with CRMs, APIs, booking tools and more, so everything works together.
We help you define a smart, scalable path forward with a website that supports your business goals.

problems.note: BW Digit helps you break through the noise with smart, custom-built solutions that actually work.
